resources.string: I am a 6th semester student at the University of Muhammadiyah Malang. As an Informatics student, I have developed my skills well by learning and sharing, especially in the area of software development. I am currently focused on the Android Development field. Apart from being a student, I am also active as a freelancer and it allows me to meet many people from different regions and countries, which helps me improve my communication skills with other people. With my determination and abilities, I believe I can become a great Android Developer!
